Svein:


To grow spirits, defeat attribute monsters to acquire XP of the same attribute.
Where are attribute monsters, you ask? Wind Attribute Hunting Ground: Land of Winds Earth Attribute Hunting Ground: Wall of Argos Water Attribute Hunting Ground: Garden of Eva Fire Attribute Hunting Ground: Forge of the Gods

And the spirits you can grwo at each hunting ground vary, so keep that in mind when selecting. Wind Attack Hunting Ground: Obtained Fire Attack XP Earth Attack Hunting Ground: Obtained Wind Attack XP Water Attack Hunting Ground: Obtained Earth Attack XP Fire Attack Hunting Ground: Obtained Water Attack XP
